Title: Raises the weight limit for all terrain vehicles and updates the fee schedule for all terrain vehicle registration
Summary: Raises the weight limit for all terrain vehicles; updates the fee schedule for all terrain vehicle registration; requires certain funds collected from all terrain vehicle registration fees to be deposited to the credit of the New York state autism awareness and research fund.
LawCode: Amd §95-e, St Fin L; amd §§2281 & 2282, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the weight limit for all terrain vehicles and fee schedule for all terrain vehicle registration
